00036 /* Common LPC2148 definitions, related to USB */
00037 #define PCONP                   *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC0C4
00038 #define PLL1CON                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC0A0
00039 #define PLL1CFG                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC0A4
00040 #define PLL1STAT                *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC0A8
00041 #define PLL1FEED                *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC0AC
00042 
00043 #define PINSEL0                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE002C000
00044 #define PINSEL1                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE002C004
00045 #define IOPIN0                  *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0028000
00046 #define IOSET0                  *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0028004
00047 #define IODIR0                  *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0028008
00048 #define IOCLR0                  *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE002800C
00049 
00050 /* USB register definitions */
00051 #define USBIntSt                *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE01FC1C0
00052 
00053 #define USBDevIntSt             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090000
00054 #define USBDevIntEn             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090004
00055 #define USBDevIntClr    *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090008
00056 #define USBDevIntSet    *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE009000C
00057 #define USBDevIntPri    *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE009002C
00058 
00059 #define USBEpIntSt              *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090030
00060 #define USBEpIntEn              *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090034
00061 #define USBEpIntClr             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090038
00062 #define USBEpIntSet             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE009003C
00063 #define USBEpIntPri             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090040
00064 
00065 #define USBReEP                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090044
00066 #define USBEpInd                *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090048
00067 #define USBMaxPSize             *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE009004C
00068 
00069 #define USBRxData               *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090018
00070 #define USBRxPLen               *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090020
00071 #define USBTxData               *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE009001C
00072 #define USBTxPLen               *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090024
00073 #define USBCtrl                 *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090028
00074 
00075 #define USBCmdCode              *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090010
00076 #define USBCmdData              *(volatile unsigned int *)0xE0090014
00077 
00078 /* USBIntSt bits */
00079 #define USB_INT_REQ_LP                          (1<<0)
00080 #define USB_INT_REQ_HP                          (1<<1)
00081 #define USB_INT_REQ_DMA                         (1<<2)
00082 #define USB_need_clock                          (1<<8)
00083 #define EN_USB_BITS                                     (1<<31)
00084 
00085 /* USBDevInt... bits */
00086 #define FRAME                                           (1<<0)
00087 #define EP_FAST                                         (1<<1)
00088 #define EP_SLOW                                         (1<<2)
00089 #define DEV_STAT                                        (1<<3)
00090 #define CCEMTY                                          (1<<4)
00091 #define CDFULL                                          (1<<5)
00092 #define RxENDPKT                                        (1<<6)
00093 #define TxENDPKT                                        (1<<7)
00094 #define EP_RLZED                                        (1<<8)
00095 #define ERR_INT                                         (1<<9)
00096 
00097 /* USBRxPLen bits */
00098 #define PKT_LNGTH                                       (1<<0)
00099 #define PKT_LNGTH_MASK                          0x3FF
00100 #define DV                                                      (1<<10)
00101 #define PKT_RDY                                         (1<<11)
00102 
00103 /* USBCtrl bits */
00104 #define RD_EN                                           (1<<0)
00105 #define WR_EN                                           (1<<1)
00106 #define LOG_ENDPOINT                            (1<<2)
00107 
00108 /* protocol engine command codes */
00109         /* device commands */
00110 #define CMD_DEV_SET_ADDRESS                     0xD0
00111 #define CMD_DEV_CONFIG                          0xD8
00112 #define CMD_DEV_SET_MODE                        0xF3
00113 #define CMD_DEV_READ_CUR_FRAME_NR       0xF5
00114 #define CMD_DEV_READ_TEST_REG           0xFD
00115 #define CMD_DEV_STATUS                          0xFE            /* read/write */
00116 #define CMD_DEV_GET_ERROR_CODE          0xFF
00117 #define CMD_DEV_READ_ERROR_STATUS       0xFB
00118         /* endpoint commands */
00119 #define CMD_EP_SELECT                           0x00
00120 #define CMD_EP_SELECT_CLEAR                     0x40
00121 #define CMD_EP_SET_STATUS                       0x40
00122 #define CMD_EP_CLEAR_BUFFER                     0xF2
00123 #define CMD_EP_VALIDATE_BUFFER          0xFA
00124 
00125 /* set address command */
00126 #define DEV_ADDR                                        (1<<0)
00127 #define DEV_EN                                          (1<<7)
00128 
00129 /* configure device command */
00130 #define CONF_DEVICE                                     (1<<0)
00131 
00132 /* set mode command */
00133 #define AP_CLK                                          (1<<0)
00134 #define INAK_CI                                         (1<<1)
00135 #define INAK_CO                                         (1<<2)
00136 #define INAK_II                                         (1<<3)
00137 #define INAK_IO                                         (1<<4)
00138 #define INAK_BI                                         (1<<5)
00139 #define INAK_BO                                         (1<<6)
00140 
00141 /* set get device status command */
00142 #define CON                                                     (1<<0)
00143 #define CON_CH                                          (1<<1)
00144 #define SUS                                                     (1<<2)
00145 #define SUS_CH                                          (1<<3)
00146 #define RST                                                     (1<<4)
00147 
00148 /* get error code command */
00149 // ...
00150 
00151 /* Select Endpoint command read bits */
00152 #define EPSTAT_FE                                       (1<<0)
00153 #define EPSTAT_ST                                       (1<<1)
00154 #define EPSTAT_STP                                      (1<<2)
00155 #define EPSTAT_PO                                       (1<<3)
00156 #define EPSTAT_EPN                                      (1<<4)
00157 #define EPSTAT_B1FULL                           (1<<5)
00158 #define EPSTAT_B2FULL                           (1<<6)
00159 
00160 /* CMD_EP_SET_STATUS command */
00161 #define EP_ST                                           (1<<0)
00162 #define EP_DA                                           (1<<5)
00163 #define EP_RF_MO                                        (1<<6)
00164 #define EP_CND_ST                                       (1<<7)
00165 
00166 /* read error status command */
00167 #define PID_ERR                                         (1<<0)
00168 #define UEPKT                                           (1<<1)
00169 #define DCRC                                            (1<<2)
00170 #define TIMEOUT                                         (1<<3)
00171 #define EOP                                                     (1<<4)
00172 #define B_OVRN                                          (1<<5)
00173 #define BTSTF                                           (1<<6)
00174 #define TGL_ERR                                         (1<<7)
